title: Sheep
data:
The **sheep**, q, is a [domestic](/wiki/Domestic "Domestic") [quadrupedal](/wiki/Quadruped "Quadruped") animal first introduced in the [Lethe patch](/wiki/Lethe_patch "Lethe patch") and [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"). It was later ported to [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"). Sheep are compatible steeds for [riding](/wiki/Riding "Riding") and can have a [saddle](/wiki/Saddle "Saddle") [applied](/wiki/Applied "Applied") to them.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)

- [2 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)

  - [2.1 Sheep](#Sheep)
  - [2.2 Lamb](#Lamb)

- [3 dNetHack](#dNetHack)

  - [3.1 Lamb](#Lamb_2)
  - [3.2 Sheep](#Sheep_2)
  - [3.3 Dire sheep](#Dire_sheep)

- [4 Strategy](#Strategy)

## Generation

Sheep are always generated peaceful, and are often found in [Sokoban](/wiki/Sokoban "Sokoban"). Lambs can also [grow up](/wiki/Grow_up "Grow up") into sheep at experience level 3.

| A sheep:* has no hands.
* is an [animal](/wiki/Animal "Animal").
* is [herbivorous](/wiki/Herbivore "Herbivore").
* is normally generated [peaceful](/wiki/Peaceful "Peaceful").
* can be [tamed by feeding](/wiki/Domestic "Domestic").
* wanders randomly.
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* normally appears in small [groups](/wiki/Group "Group"). |                                                                                                                  |

| A dire sheep:* has no hands.
* is an [animal](/wiki/Animal "Animal").
* is [herbivorous](/wiki/Herbivore "Herbivore").
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* normally appears in small [groups](/wiki/Group "Group").
* cannot be [tamed](/wiki/Scroll_of_taming "Scroll of taming"). |                                                      |

**Dire sheep** are somewhat more physically threatening than other types of sheep, and far more hostile. Each sheep has a 1/20 chance of dropping a [woolen](/wiki/Woolen "Woolen") [piece of cloth](/wiki/Piece_of_cloth "Piece of cloth") when killed.

## Strategy

Sheep are generally trivial to tame, but their attacks and base level are usually too weak to be worth it. Additionally, they are [herbivorous](/wiki/Herbivorous "Herbivorous") and somewhat more difficult to keep fed than most pets.

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Sheep

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

The sheep, q, is a domestic quadrupedal animal first introduced in the Lethe patch and SLASH'EM. It was later ported to dNetHack. Sheep are compatible steeds for riding and can have a saddle applied to them.

Contents

  • 1 Generation
  • 2 SLASH'EM
    • 2.1 Sheep
    • 2.2 Lamb
  • 3 dNetHack
    • 3.1 Lamb
    • 3.2 Sheep
    • 3.3 Dire sheep
  • 4 Strategy

Generation

Sheep are always generated peaceful, and are often found in Sokoban. Lambs can also grow up into sheep at experience level 3.

SLASH'EM

Sheep

q sheep
Difficulty 5
Attacks Head butt 1d4, Kick 1d3
q sheep
Difficulty 5
Attacks

Head butt 1d4, Kick 1d3

Base level 3
Base experience 28
Speed 12
Base AC 8
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 2 (Quite rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 700
Nutritional value 100
Size Medium
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A sheep:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • is herbivorous.
  • is normally generated peaceful.
  • can be tamed by feeding.
  • wanders randomly.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • normally appears in small groups.

Dire sheep are somewhat more physically threatening than other types of sheep, and far more hostile. Each sheep has a 1/20 chance of dropping a woolen piece of cloth when killed.

Strategy

Sheep are generally trivial to tame, but their attacks and base level are usually too weak to be worth it. Additionally, they are herbivorous and somewhat more difficult to keep fed than most pets.

rawPage:
The '''sheep''', {{monsym|sheep}}, is a [[domestic]] [[quadruped]]al animal first introduced in the [[Lethe patch]] and [[SLASH'EM]]. It was later ported to [[dNetHack]]. Sheep are compatible steeds for [[riding]] and can have a [[saddle]] [[applied]] to them.

==Generation==
Sheep are always generated peaceful, and are often found in [[Sokoban]]. Lambs can also [[grow up]] into sheep at experience level 3.

'''Dire sheep''' are somewhat more physically threatening than other types of sheep, and far more hostile. Each sheep has a 1/20 chance of dropping a [[woolen]] [[piece of cloth]] when killed.
{{clear}}

==Strategy==
Sheep are generally trivial to tame, but their attacks and base level are usually too weak to be worth it. Additionally, they are [[herbivorous]] and somewhat more difficult to keep fed than most pets.

{{clear}}
